data.text: @jakovanrensburg @gillianoberholzer Initially this call was created to confirm via Trello that this can be done. Sameer requires a rough time-frame in order to quote and add additional markup re this feature. Client is "Bricmor Auction Group (Pty) Ltd" and they would like their logo to display on all search results. Ad mentioned this is only possible for PDF exports so this should be done for all PDF exports. Gill, i have emailed thier logo to you so please upload. Their website is www.bricmore.co.za
